title: Eurovision.Song.Contest.2016.SF2.EBU-FEED.reenc.1080i.AC3-icecub
description:
This is the 1080i re-encode of the original EBU feed transport stream posted. Size really doesn't matter! ;)

Original feed ts posted by Anonymous as:  Eurovision Song Contest 2016: Stockholm (2nd SF) [FEED 1080i]

WORDS OF CAUTION WHEN PLAYING BACK!

Media player tests/comparison. Original transport stream. Players used:
VLC 2.2.1
MS Media player Ver. 12.07601.19148
MPC+HC Media Player Classic with CCCP:MPC 64-bit 1.7.8.162/CCCP Raise Your Flag 2015-10-18

Playing back the original feed transport stream:
MS Media player: There's no image playing the original feed. There is sound, but no picture. File opens in a windows not corresponding with actual size.
VLC: Severe colour, time jump and image/sound sync issues. Colours are bled out with usually red remaining to some extent. Colour comes and goes. Does not correct sync.
MPC: Jump issues. Change slider and image is frozen for quite a while. No colour issues and possibly a 1/10 or 1/20 second image/sound sync issue at the end.

Playing back my 1080i re-encode:
MPC: No colour issues. No discernible image/sound sync issues at the end.
VLC: VLC: Colour issues, but lesser. No jump issues. No artifacts. No sync issues.
MS Media player: Some severe jump issues with artifacts sometimes but this does not affect sound. Will right itself. 

Media player MPC comparison original with re-encoded file. No difference in image or sound.

Recommended media player is CCCP package with the Media Player Classic found at http://www.cccp-project.net/
